## ProtocolTokenStake class

Represents a user's ProtocolToken stake and accrued gains.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ProtocolTokenStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getProtocolTokenStake()](./stablecoin-lib-base.readableprotocol.getprotocoltokenstake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ProtocolTokenStake` class.
